title: About Milvus Bootcamp
description: Milvus is the world most popular open-source vector database. It aims to help users deal with the challenges that comes with massive-scale, unstructured through the following methods:
High-performance, high-precision and scalable search of vectors; Similarity search and analysis of unstructured data.
